job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in a business-related field or equivalent experience

jd: From: Abhishek Yadav, DMS Visions INC abhishek@dmsvisions.com Reply to: abhishek@dmsvisions.com Hi,Hope you are doing well !!I have an urgent position. Kindly go through the Job description and let me know if this would be of interest to you. Job Title: Business Analyst - Appian - AWDLocation: 100% Remote roleDuration: 6+ Months Contract ****While sharing resume mention consultant location and visa status*** Job Description: We are seeking a Business Analyst with prior insurance industry experience who is skilled at gathering business requirements, user stories, and QA. The project involves business process automation migrating from the workflow management tool AWD - Automated Workflow Distributor to Appian platform. Responsibilities:• Develop business requirements for multiple systems, up/downstream applications and tools (specifically AWD, Appian, APIs) in coordination with key stakeholders.• Review user stories created by technical partners for completeness and accuracy to the business requirements.• Review quality assurance test plans for positive, negative, and regression test cases related to the user story.• Create and execute user acceptance test plans.Qualifications:• Bachelor’s degree in a business-related field or equivalent experience.• Five years of experience working complex technical projects.• Ability to communicate with all levels of the organization to influence others towards strategic goals.• Analytical and problem-solving skills to plan strategy, tactics and perform root-cause analysis.• Familiarity with project management tools, lifecycles, etc.• Proficiency using MS Office toolsPreferred Qualifications:• Basic knowledge of insurance company operations.• Strong organizational and analytical skills with attention to detail.• Excellent written, verbal and presentation skills.• Ability to accept changing priorities and address issues quickly and professionally.• Knowledge of multiple project management frameworks (waterfall, agile). Proficiency in JIRA. If you are interested, please share your updated resume and suggest the best number & time to connect with you. Thanks & Regards, Abhishek YadavDMS Vision Inc. | http://dmsvisions.com/4645 Avon Lane, Suite 210, Frisco, TX 75033Email: abhishek@dmsvisions.com | Phone : 972-645-5314 | EXT - 103
